mapper.select: SELECT RANKING.RANK AS RANK, U.NAME AS NAME, RANKING.COUNT AS COUNT, U.LOGO_URL AS LOGO_URL FROM ( SELECT M.UNIVERSITY_ID, SUM(M.ZERO_WASTE_COUNT) AS COUNT, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(M.ZERO_WASTE_COUNT) DESC) AS RANK FROM MEMBER M GROUP BY M.UNIVERSITY_ID ) RANKING JOIN UNIVERSITY U ON RANKING.UNIVERSITY_ID = U.ID ORDER BY RANKING.RANK
